dcterms:description: A test collection for evaluating legal case law search, designed to assess the effectiveness of legal information retrieval systems.
dcterms:title: English language test collection for case law retrieval

dcterms:description: A German language test collection aimed at addressing challenges in the development of effective systems for professional legal search.

dcterms:creator: J. Rabelo

dcterms:description: The Competition on Legal Information Extraction/Entailment (COLIEE) focuses on methods for legal document retrieval and entailment, providing a benchmark for evaluating legal information retrieval systems.
dcterms:title: Competition on Legal Information Extraction/Entailment (COLIEE)

dcterms:description: An internally known golden answer set containing queries and their expected top-ranked results, created by domain experts.
dcterms:title: Golden answer set (internally known)

dcterms:description: Implicit feedback data collected from the Legal Intelligence system, used to infer relevance from user interactions.
dcterms:title: Implicit feedback data from Legal Intelligence system
